string-array.item: Add items to your Home screen.

string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: Touch the Launcher icon at the bottom of the screen. @drawable/all_apps
Touch & hold an empty spot to add shortcuts or widgets.
Touch & hold an item and when it vibrates, drag it where you want.
Swipe left or right to switch. Move items to other screens.
Touch & hold an item and when it vibrates, drag it to the Trash icon. @drawable/trash
Pull the Status bar down from the top of the screen.
Press the Menu button and touch Settings.
